title: Why has my Forums account been banned?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am trying to sign in to my Unity Forums account
  • I receive an error saying that my account has been disabled

sections.title: Cause
content: If your Unity Forums account has been banned, it could be for one of these reasons:

• Your posts contain spam
  • You have displayed offensive behaviour to other Forum members
  • Your account has been associated with piracy, or other illegal behaviour

sections.title: Resolution
content: Please be careful not to post the same message multiple times, as this can be registered as spam in our systems.
If you feel that your account has been banned unfairly, please contact our Support team by creating a new ticket here.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please see this article for other reasons why an account may be disabled.
